content: no part of this publication may be reproduced in any form or by any means it is strictly prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes slip_stitch in last double_crochet in front lp and 1 strand from post chain 3 slip_stitch in next double_crochet 6 times chain 3 slip_stitch in 2 sts at the same time 3rd slip_stitch and slip_stitch in each of next 2 chain counts as chain-2 chain it was made in picot slip_stitch in slip knot 7 copyright © 2019 natalia kononova all rights reserved all documents are the property of natalia kononova no part of this publication may be reproduced in any form or by any means it is strictly prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes make a big lp pass yarn skein through lp tighten knot skip 16 cm 6 ¼ of yarn between 2 stars repeat 1st star 9 times cut off yarn leaving 22 cm / 8 5/8 end fold 9 cm / 3 ½ and tie a knot creating about 16 cm / 6 ¼ hanging loop thank you for choosing my pattern join newsletter list to never miss a new pattern or exclusive discount http //www outstandingcrochet com/ follow youtube instagram facebook etsy ravelry accounts for pattern support contact natalia outstandingcrochet@gmail com 8 copyright © 2019 natalia kononova all rights reserved all documents are the property of natalia kononova no part of this publication may be reproduced in any form or by any means it is strictly prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes
